K06bsu030_u:3348: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
K06bsu030_u:3353: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti //
K06bsu030_u:3354: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
K06bsu030_u:3366: carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
K06bsu030_u:3369: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
K06bsu030_u:3370: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
K06bsu030_u:3373: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3377: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3380: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
K06bsu030_u:3383: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
K06bsu030_u:3385: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
K06bsu030_u:3387: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
K06bsu030_u:3390: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3391: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
K06bsu030_u:3393: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge
K06bsu030_u:3394: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
K06bsu030_u:3395: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
K06bsu030_u:3406: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
K06bsu030_u:3431: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3433: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena /
K06bsu030_u:3436: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
K06bsu030_u:3437: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
K06bsu030_u:3438: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
K06bsu030_u:3445: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ - ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
K06bsu030_u:3451: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
K06bsu030_u:3452: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
K06bsu030_u:3460: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
K06bsu030_u:3467: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
K06bsu030_u:3468: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
K06bsu030_u:3472: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
K06bsu030_u:3473: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
K06bsu030_u:3474: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
K06bsu030_u:3475: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti /
K06bsu030_u:3482: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
K06bsu030_u:3485: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
K06bsu030_u:3487: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
K06bsu030_u:3488: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya /
K06bsu030_u:3489: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3490: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati //
K06bsu030_u:3491: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
K06bsu030_u:3492: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
K06bsu030_u:3494: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
K06bsu030_u:3496: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati /
K06bsu030_u:3499: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3503: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3507: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
K06bsu030_u:3510: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
K06bsu030_u:3512: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
K06bsu030_u:3514: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
K06bsu030_u:3518: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
K06bsu030_u:3522: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
K06bsu030_u:3525: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati /
K06bsu030_u:3528: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
K06bsu030_u:3530: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
K06bsu030_u:3532: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3537: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3542: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3546: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3548: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
K06bsu030_u:3549: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati /
K06bsu030_u:3550: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3551: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
K06bsu030_u:3552: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati /
K06bsu030_u:3553: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
K06bsu030_u:3554: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
K06bsu030_u:3555: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K06bsu030_u:3572: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
K06bsu030_u:3573: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
K06bsu030_u:3577: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
K06bsu030_u:3585: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
K06bsu030_u:3586: (Vaidya 67) evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati /
K06bsu030_u:3588: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
K06bsu030_u:3624: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
K06bsu030_u:3629: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya?)
K06bsu030_u:3630: darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
K06bsu030_u:3633: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
K06bsu030_u:3635: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
K06bsu030_u:3642: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
K06bsu030_u:3645: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
K06bsu030_u:3647: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
K06bsu030_u:3653: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
K06bsu030_u:3659: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
K06bsu030_u:3680: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
K06bsu030_u:3685: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
K06bsu030_u:3686: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi
K06bsu030_u:3687: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya
K06bsu030_u:3689: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K06bsu030_u:3690: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
K06bsu030_u:3691: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3694: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā - mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
K06bsu030_u:3696: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3697: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
K06bsu030_u:3698: atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya,
K06bsu030_u:3701: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
K06bsu030_u:3702: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3703: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3705: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
K06bsu030_u:3706: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
K06bsu030_u:3709: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca //
K06bsu030_u:3710: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
K06bsu030_u:3717: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3719: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
K06bsu030_u:3722: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3724: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3732: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
K06bsu030_u:3733: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
K06bsu030_u:3737: veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3739: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
K06bsu030_u:3741: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
K06bsu030_u:3746: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
K06bsu030_u:3751: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
K06bsu030_u:3755: te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
K06bsu030_u:3757: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
K06bsu030_u:3758: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3759: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
K06bsu030_u:3765: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
K06bsu030_u:3766: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
K06bsu030_u:3767: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
K06bsu030_u:3771: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
K06bsu030_u:3772: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti /
K06bsu030_u:3773: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3774: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim //
K06bsu030_u:3775: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
K06bsu030_u:3777: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3778: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
K06bsu030_u:3780: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
K06bsu030_u:3781: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
K06bsu030_u:3788: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo 'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
K06bsu030_u:3791: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
K06bsu030_u:3792: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
K06bsu030_u:3796: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca
K06bsu030_u:3797: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
K06bsu030_u:3802: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
K06bsu030_u:3809: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3810: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
K06bsu030_u:3840: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
K06bsu030_u:3848: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
K06bsu030_u:3864: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3866: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
K06bsu030_u:3868: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum //
K06bsu030_u:3869: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate
K06bsu030_u:3870: sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam - śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte
K06bsu030_u:3871: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye
K06bsu030_u:3875: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ
K06bsu030_u:3878: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3879: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3881: paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā
K06bsu030_u:3882: asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo 'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ
K06bsu030_u:3885: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3886: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ
K06bsu030_u:3899: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
K06bsu030_u:3900: mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot /
K06bsu030_u:3901: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
K06bsu030_u:3908: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
K06bsu030_u:3909: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
K06bsu030_u:3910: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
K06bsu030_u:3911: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3913: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3915: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin,
K06bsu030_u:3918: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena /
K06bsu030_u:3919: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3922: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3926: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
K06bsu030_u:3930: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
K06bsu030_u:3936: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
K06bsu030_u:3938: upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
K06bsu030_u:3941: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
K06bsu030_u:3943: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
K06bsu030_u:3944: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya /
K06bsu030_u:3945: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3947: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3950: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3951: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
K06bsu030_u:3953: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
K06bsu030_u:3956: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
K06bsu030_u:3958: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya //
K06bsu030_u:3968: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās
K06bsu030_u:3970: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K06bsu030_u:3971: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
